intension: Design a cute and festive Christmas greeting for Instagram story using cartoon elements such as trees, socks, and candy cups. The text should read 'Merry Xmas'.
globalcaption: The image features a festive scene with a Merry Christmas greeting written in a colorful and playful style. The background is a vibrant red, and the words are written in a combination of orange, yellow, and green colors. \n\nThere are several objects scattered throughout the image, including a few stars, a candy cane, and a couple of oranges. Additionally, there are two teddy bears in the scene, one located towards the top left corner and the other in the top right corner. A bow can also be seen in the top left corner, adding to the festive atmosphere.
keywords: christmas, holiday, winter, merry, illustration, celebration, festive, xmas, cute, greeting, cartoon, trees, socks, candy, cup, hellochristmas, instagram, story, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a colorful and festive scene with a red background. There are several stars scattered throughout the scene, some of which are green and red in color. A few oranges are also present, adding to the vibrant hues. \n\nIn addition to the stars, there are two candy canes, one located towards the left side of the image and the other towards the right. A bow is also visible, placed in the middle of the scene. The combination of these elements creates a visually appealing and cheerful atmosphere
